nodes.text: The Kuari suite, along with the Emperor suite, was one of the two luxury suites on the Bazaar Deck of the luxury liner Kuari Princess. Both suites featured deluxe refreshments centers, split-level entertainment room, holo-overlay projector with sensory adapter, a stock of vintage Pludris, original kinesculpture by Xephi Sep, private sentient butler, zero-g sauna, and private computer. Each suite cost a thousand credits a day.
